notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All authors were involved in the conceptualisation of the study; A.O. and O.O. had the oversight of the chemical study of G.M. and M.N. while M.G. had oversight of the bioassay conducted by G.M. and M.N.; investigation, G.M. and M.N.; writing—original draft preparation, was by M.G. and M.N.; writing—review and editing, O.O., A.O. and M.G.; supervision, A.O., O.O. and M.G.; project administration, A.O.; funding acquisition, A.O. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
